description:
Located in New Albany, Indiana, The Law Office of Nick Stein provides unmatched counsel and support to clients throughout Floyd County and beyond. Our attorneys help those who have legal needs involving any of the following practice areas:

• Personal injury and wrongful death
• Medical malpractice
• Social Security Disability
• Criminal defense
• Family law and divorce
• Estate planning

With more than 50 years of combined legal experience, our law firm's top-rated attorneys possess the extensive skills and resources necessary to handle your matter efficiently, and we promise to do all we can help increase your chances of obtaining the favorable results you seek. A lifelong resident of New Albany, attorney Nick Stein has a long history serving the members of our community. He established our legal practice with a mission to deliver the highest level of representation possible to those in need.

Devoted to your needs, we will not rest until we have explored every method to improve the likelihood you will obtain the maximum amount of compensation you deserve. We have secured millions of dollars in settlements and verdicts for our plaintiff injury clients, and we have achieved successful outcomes for those accused of criminal violations as well as those going through divorce. We also have assisted many others with protecting themselves, their assets and their loved ones for the future.

To begin receiving the compassion you want and the attention you deserve directly from the attorney you need, you can contact The Law Office of Nick Stein to schedule a free initial consultation.
